channel.title: Failsafe
channel.description:
Is there a code i can put so if someone isnt in the list they get banned or something?
someone can make themself and others admin/mod and i cant stop them
can i put a code somewhere so if the account name isnt in the code it will demote, ban, and ipban them?

item.title: Failsafe
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

could i do

if(playerName == “name”) {
playerRights = 1;
banUser(playerName);
ipBanUser(playerName);
}
if(playerName == “name”) {
playerRights = 2;
banUser(playerName);
ipBanUser(playerName);
}
if(playerName == “name”) {
playerRights = 3;
banUser(playerName);
ipBanUser(playerName);
}
if(playerName == “name”) {
playerRights = 4;
banUser(playerName);
ipBanUser(playerName);
}

like that?

Read full topic

item.title: Failsafe
item.dc:creator: @nadnerb_doow nadnerb_doow
item.description:
@nadnerb_doow wrote:

if(playerName == "name") {
	playerRights = 0;
	banUser(playerName);
	ipBanUser(playerName);
}

Something similar to that in your login method would work. Obviously you’d need to change banUser and ipBanUser to whatever your banning methods are named.

Read full topic
